titleStmt.title: Medicina militaris, or, A body of military medicines experimented by Raymundus Mindererus ... ; Englished out of High-Dutch.
Medicina militaris. English
titleStmt.author: Minderer, Raymund, 1570?-1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Godbid, and are to be sold by Moses Pitt ...,

notesStmt.note: Previously issued as v. [3] of Paul Barbette's A complete treatise of chirurgery : containing the chirurgical and anatomical works, second edition. London : 1674. It was apparently also issued separately.
The German original was first published in Augsburg in 1620 under title: Medicina militaris, seu, Libellus castrensis ... id est : Gemaine Handstücklein zur Kriegs-Artzney gehörig.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
